Module com.example.project3
Package com.example.project3

Class Sort

java.lang.Object
com.example.project3.Sort
public class Sort extends Object
This class provides methods, using selection sort, to sort for the provider and appointment list.

      public Sort()

  • Method Details

    • appointment

      public static void appointment(List<Appointment> list, char key)
      Sorts a list of appointments based on the specified key. Sorting options include: - 'D' for sorting by date. - 'P' for sorting by patient profile. - 'L' for sorting by location.
      Parameters:
      list - The list of appointments to be sorted.
      key - The sorting key: 'D' for date, 'P' for profile, 'L' for location.
      Throws:
      NoSuchElementException - if the key is not recognized.

    • swap

      private static <E> void swap(List<E> list, int index1, int index2)
      Helper method: Generic swap method to swap elements in any list

    • compareProviders

      private static int compareProviders(Provider p1, Provider p2)
      Compares two Provider objects based on their profiles. The comparison is primarily done by the last name of the providers. If the last names are equal, it further compares by the date of birth.
      Parameters:
      p1 - the first provider to compare
      p2 - the second provider to compare
      Returns:
      a negative integer, zero, or a positive integer as the first argument is less than, equal to, or greater than the second.

    • provider

      public static void provider(List<Provider> list)
      Sorts a list of providers based on their profiles. The sorting is primarily based on the last name of the provider, and if the last names are equal, it then sorts based on the date of birth.
      Parameters:
      list - the list of providers to be sorted

    • sortByDate

      private static void sortByDate(List<Appointment> list)
      This method sorts the Appointment list by appointment date, time, then providerâ€™s name. If date is the same, then compare time, if time comparison is the same, then compare provider's name.
      Parameters:
      list - , the list of appointments

    • sortByProfile

      private static void sortByProfile(List<Appointment> list)
      Sorts the list ordered by patient profile, date/timeslot
      Parameters:
      list - , the list of Appointments to be sorted

    • sortByLocation

      private static void sortByLocation(List<Appointment> list)
      Sorting the list ordered by county, date/timeslot. If county comparison is equal, sort by date, if date comparison is equal sort by timeslot.
      Parameters:
      list - , the list of Appointments to be sorted.
